about_the_game:
The Defender Pack is back! Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the iconic Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Defender Pack for Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

The Endowment Pack includes:

- 1 'The Defender' Pistol Weapon Blueprint including custom themed optic and reticle (Rare)
- 1 'Hot and Cold' Weapon Camo (Base)
- 1 'Old School' Watch (Epic)
- 1 'Honor the Call' Weapon Charm (Rare)
- 1 'Endowment' Weapon Sticker (Rare)
- 1 'Secret CODE' Spray (Rare)
- 1 'CODE All Star' Spray (Rare)
- 1 'Zoomin' Emblem (Rare)
- 1 'Flat Back' Emblem (Rare)
- 1 'Sturdy Stripes' Emblem (Rare)
- 1 'Hooah' Calling Card (Rare)

The full purchase price for this special item, less VAT, will be donated to the Call of Duty Endowment (EIN: 37-1589072). The Call of Duty Endowment places unemployed and underemployed veterans in the U.S. and U.K. into high-quality jobs*. By purchasing this pack, you will directly contribute to the Endowment’s mission.

This is a limited time offer that will end once $2 million USD has been raised for the cause.
detailed_description:
The Defender Pack is back! Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the iconic Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Defender Pack for Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

The Endowment Pack includes:

- 1 'The Defender' Pistol Weapon Blueprint including custom themed optic and reticle (Rare)
- 1 'Hot and Cold' Weapon Camo (Base)
- 1 'Old School' Watch (Epic)
- 1 'Honor the Call' Weapon Charm (Rare)
- 1 'Endowment' Weapon Sticker (Rare)
- 1 'Secret CODE' Spray (Rare)
- 1 'CODE All Star' Spray (Rare)
- 1 'Zoomin' Emblem (Rare)
- 1 'Flat Back' Emblem (Rare)
- 1 'Sturdy Stripes' Emblem (Rare)
- 1 'Hooah' Calling Card (Rare)

The full purchase price for this special item, less VAT, will be donated to the Call of Duty Endowment (EIN: 37-1589072). The Call of Duty Endowment places unemployed and underemployed veterans in the U.S. and U.K. into high-quality jobs*. By purchasing this pack, you will directly contribute to the Endowment’s mission.

This is a limited time offer that will end once $2 million USD has been raised for the cause.
legal_notice:
*For more information please see https://www.callofdutyendowment.org/partners.

This pack is not cross-platform supported and may be accessible on Steam only.

© 2019-2022 Call of Duty Endowment. © 2019-2022 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY WARZONE, WARZONE, and MODERN WARFARE are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. All other trademarks and trade names are property of their respective owners.

package_groups.title: Buy Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) - Defender Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 175 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit latest update
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ R5 1600X Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 390 / AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 175 GB available space

short_description: We heard from the fans, so our biggest Endowment cosmetic content pack ever is back. It includes The Defender Pistol cosmetic weapon variant, weapon camo, watch, weapon charm, weapon sticker, 2 environment sprays, 3 emblems and a calling card!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
